comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Quote from: Boakse on February 03, 2023, 12:16:19 AMAfter (more then)  6 - 8 hours LTC Blockchain says deposit is confirmed, Binance still doesn't confirm deppposit...?While deposit is confirmed in Binance deposit but the deposit is NOT counted to my account???Are you sure that you sent to the same address shown in your account? Sometimes there are viruses on your device that modify the address that you copy to scammer address.If the address is correct and the transaction is not confirmed even though it was confirmed in any other block explorer, you have two options:Either there is a synchronization problem with the node, and then it will be resolved in the coming hours.Or there is a problem with your account, and then the support team is the only one who will solve the problem.
